name: Sudokoo
goals: Visualize the spatial interactions that are found when solving a sudoku
Gain development experience by building my first React web app from scratch
Make the joy of sudoku accessible without the need for arcane knowledge

features.text: Hueristic-based sudoku solving AI that explains each step in its process
Enter your own sudoku, or get started right away with a random one
Animated visuals highlight the row, column, and house interactions of each solution technique
State navigation buttons allow you to go forward, backward, or auto-play through solutions
Responsive design for both mobile and desktop

learned: How to design, plan, and build a React app as a solo developer
How to manage complex component state using React hooks such as useState
How to train a crow to solve my sudoku for me
